[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@digitalpersona/enrollment](./enrollment.md) &gt; [EnrollmentContext](./enrollment.enrollmentcontext.md) &gt; [user](./enrollment.enrollmentcontext.user.md)

## EnrollmentContext.user property

A JSON Web Token or a username of a user whose credentials are to be enrolled.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
user: JSONWebToken | User;
```

## Remarks

Only DigitalPersona users (formerly "Altus User") can be enrolled without authentication, i.e. using only a user name. Other users must be authenticated, i.e. have a JSON Web Token.
